General.Name: DecideAct A/S
General.Description: DecideAct A/S provides cloud-based strategy execution management and governance platform for organizations. The company's strategy execution management platform delivers transparency, accountability, and follow-up for public companies, as well as environmental, social, and corporate governance (ESG) modules. DecideAct A/S was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Nexø, Denmark.
